name: Youna Kwak
bio: Youna Kwak is a writer, translator, and teacher. Current works-in-progress include a book on intimacy, autobiography, and Roland Barthes, and a translation of Véronique Bizot's Les Jardiniers. Her work has been published in the Boston Review, The Brooklyn Rail, Cerise Press, The Conversant, Horizon Review, Left-Facing Bird, Muthafucka, Neo, The Offing, Po&sie, Talking River, and West Branch Wired.
